item.title: Scar-Lead Salvation debut trailer, gameplay, details, and screenshots
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/scar-lead-salvation-debut-trailer-gameplay-details-and-screenshots

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

Returnal-like third-person shooter due out on May 29 in Japan.

Publisher Compile Heart and developer Neilo have released the first official trailer, gameplay videos, information, and screenshots for newly announced third-person shooter Scar-Lead Salvation, which is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam on May 29 in Japan.

The PlayStation 5 version will be available both physically and digitally, while the PlayStation 4 and PC versions will be digital-only. The standard edition will cost 8,580 yen, while the Special Edition will cost 12,980 yen, and the Digital Deluxe Edition will cost 10,780 yen. The Special Edition includes a special box with ab illustration by marumoru, a visual art and setting materials book, the original soundtrack CD, a metal card case, a staff ID card, and two Willow serial number stickers. The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the digital art book and a digital soundtrack.

It is also worth noting that the PC version is noted as being distributed by Idea Factory International, which could suggest Scar-Lead Salvation is planned for a simultaneous worldwide release on May 29. However, this has yet to be confirmed.

Get the first details below.

■ Story

Willow Martin awakens in an unfamiliar room. She has no memory of her past, nor why she is here.

Who is she? Where did she come from? Is the AI offering her advice an ally or an enemy?

After surviving life-or-death battles against mechanical weapons, what lies ahead for Willow?

■ Characters

  • Willow Martin (voiced by Fairouz Ai) – The protagonist who has no memory of her past. Although she can’t remember anything, she gets caught up in battles against mechanical weapons. Her body moves instinctively, and she displays exceptional combat skills. Will she be able to escape her confined space and recover her lost memories?
  • AI (voiced by Junichi Suwabe) – A mysterious entity that suddenly starts speaking to Willow through her intercom. Despite sensing some hidden agenda in the voice calling itself “AI,” Willow ends up hearing it out. Who is this being, and why is it helping Willow?
  • ❮
  • ❯

■ System

Escape from the loop of repeated death.

With a high difficulty that even advanced players will find challenging, death is not the end.

Willow Awakens in a Mysterious Research Facility and is Attacked by Armed Machines

When Willow dies, she loses her weapons and must restart the stage from the beginning. Evade the relentless bullet barrage, gather powerful weapons, and launch your counterattack.

Enemies are armed machines. Fight off the numerous mechanical weapons that attack you.

Each enemy has its own method of attack, so determine the right strategy to avoid taking hits.

The Further You Progress, The Stronger the Enemies Become… Including Huge Biological Weapons

Use actions to gain the upper hand:

  • Mirage Shift – An ability that breaks down the body into data and transports it to a separate space. In addition to passing through attacks, it can be used to quickly move short distances or through the air.
  • Striker – A weapon mounted on your armor’s fist. Upon activation, it charges toward the target, dealing significant damage upon impact. It requires close proximity, making it risky, but the damage dealt is substantial.

item.title: Capcom Spotlight + Monster Hunter Wilds Showcase set for February 4
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/capcom-spotlight-monster-hunter-wilds-showcase-set-for-february-4

Featuring Monster Hunter Wilds, Onimusha: Way of the Sword, and Capcom fighting collections.

Capcom will host a Capcom Spotlight broadcast followed directly by a Monster Hunter Wilds Showcase on February 4 at 2:00 p.m. PT / 5:00 p.m. ET / February 5 at 7:00 JST, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (English, Japanese).

The 35-minute broadcast will feature “back-to-back info about all that’s coming from Capcom,” including Monster Hunter Wilds, Onimusha: Way of the Sword, Capcom Fighting Collection 2, and Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics, followed by further information on Monster Hunter Wilds with producer Ryozo Tsujimoto, including the latest trailer and details about the second open beta test.

item.title: Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage coming to Switch on May 29
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/shikhondo-youkai-rampage-coming-to-switch-on-may-29

  • Switch

Shoot 'em up currently available for PC.

Publisher CFK and developer DeerFarm will release a Switch version of shoot ’em up game Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage on May 29, the companies announced.

Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage first launched for PC via Steam on April 18, 2024.

In Japan, the Switch version will be available both physically and digitally. The standard physical edition will cost 5,478 yen, while the first-print limited edition will cost 8,778 yen. The latter includes a special box, art book, 10-track original soundtrack CD, and a diorama acrylic stand.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Popular vertically scrolling shoot’em up game Shikhondo is back and powered up! One day, the soul-starved Youkai escape from the depths of hell. Now, the story of the Grim Reaper and the girl who has fallen into this land begins!

Key Features

  • Continuing the Long Line of Shoot’em Up Classics – Boasts unique and charming protagonists, a variety of bosses with bizarre and fantastical designs, and waves upon waves of enemies to keep players on their toes!
  • The Charm of Eastern Fantasy – In reimagining the Youkai from Korean folktales and historical records from a new perspective, the game features inventive original characters drawn in an elegant fashion and a gripping story fully-voiced by professional voice actresses.
  • Soul Collection System – Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage features a unique system called ‘Soul Collect’, where players can charge their ‘Soul Gauge’ as they avoid enemy bullets. It’s perilous, but the closer players stay to bullets, the faster their gauges charge! Then, players can use their dodge to evade bullets for a moment! Nullify enemy attacks and shoot for a new high score!
  • Various Game Modes – Play through the main story in Arcade mode, focus down the bosses in Boss Rush mode, or get double souls but lose in a single hit in Hardcore mode. Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage also features a new Dual mode, a strategic single-player mode that allows switching between the two protagonists to match the circumstances players face! In addition, the game has been reworked, adding new optional features and even a new stage!

Characters

  • The Girl – One day, the girl falls into this world, losing even the memory of her own name. She begins her harrowing journey to fight the youkai in search of her memories, her hometown, and her family.
  • Grim Reaper – Death’s emissary who must face the begrudged souls-turned-Youkai and perform her given duties. She happens upon the girl, teaming up to help her.

item.title: Piczle Cross: Rune Factory launches February 20
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/piczle-cross-rune-factory-launches-february-20

  • PC
  • Switch

Solve nonogram puzzles in the world of Rune Factory.

Nonogram puzzle game Piczle Cross: Rune Factory will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on February 20, publisher Rainy Frog and developer Score Studios announced. It will support English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

From the creator of the Piczle series comes the latest nonogram experience.

Experience the characters, monsters, and world of the Rune Factory series through addictive nonogram logic-puzzles!

Key Features

  • 300 nonogram puzzles with both classic and color variations!
  • 20 collage puzzles, made up of many smaller puzzles, both in classic and color variations!
  • Fight and capture monsters!
  • Uncover villagers and bachelors!
  • Customize your farm, pick your spouse and choose your weapons!
  • Unlock entries in the in-game Compendium and learn about the characters in Rune Factory!
  • Unlock entries in the in-game Bestiary and learn more about the beasts of Rigbarth!
  • The most feature-rich nonogram experience available!
  • Dozens of Quality of Life features, as well as aides for newcomers and a challenge mode for experts
  • Challenge yourself… or don’t! There is no wrong way to play!
